403.title: Access denied
403.message: You do not have permissions to access that page.
403.description: If you believe this is an error, please contact your administrator.

possibleReasons.title: This might happen because:
possibleReasons.noPermission: You don't have the required permissions

404.title: Oops, sorry we can't find that page!
404.message: The page you're looking for doesn't exist.
404.description: The page you are looking for has either moved, or doesn't exist.

possibleReasons.title: This might happen because:
possibleReasons.typo: There's a typo in the URL

404.searchSuggestion: Try searching for what you need

500.title: Oh, something went wrong.
500.message: Something went wrong on our end.
500.description: Please file an issue if you believe this is a bug.

possibleActions.title: What you can do:
possibleActions.wait: Wait a few minutes and try again
possibleActions.contact: Contact support if the problem persists

network.title: Connection error
network.message: Unable to connect to the server.
network.description: Please check your internet connection and try again.

timeout.title: Request timeout
timeout.message: The request took too long to complete.
timeout.description: Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.

generic.title: Something went wrong
generic.description: Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.
generic.contactSupport: If the problem persists, please contact support

api.connectionFailed: Unable to connect to the server
api.notFound: The requested resource was not found
api.unauthorized: You are not authorized to perform this action
api.rateLimited: Too many requests. Please wait a moment and try again

auth.accountLocked: Your account has been locked. Please contact support.
auth.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
auth.emailAlreadyExists: A user with this email address already exists

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.message: The page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

forbidden.title: Access denied
forbidden.message: You don't have permission to access this page.

serverError.title: Server error
serverError.message: Something went wrong on our end. Please try again later.
